text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The candidate answer explicitly addresses coordination strategies for managing multiple proceedings under Part III. It details several relevant mechanisms: establishing a centralized litigation governance structure (CLO, weekly calls, unified system), proposing a specific sequencing strategy for procedural phases across the three jurisdictions, and outlining detailed protective order coordination strategies tailored to the rules of the UK (CPR 31.22), California (CCP \u00a72019.030), and Germany (Geheimhaltungsanordnung). It also addresses conflict avoidance related to inconsistent admissions and expert testimony.
